verse.name: v1
verse.lines: How high the gulls fly o'er Islay, How sad the farm land deep in plague, Felt like the grain on your sand.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: How well the sleep's bill music makes, Roving the cliffs where fancy takes Felt like a tide left me here.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: How blessed the forest with birds song, How neat the cut peat laid so long, Fell like a seed on your land.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Felt like a tide left me here, Felt like a grain on your sand, Felt like a grain on your sand.
